Item 5.02 - Departure of Directors or Ce.content: On February 5, 2022, Peter Thiel notified Meta Platforms, Inc. (the “Company”) that he will not stand for re-election to the Company’s Board of Directors (the “Board”) at the Company’s 2022 Annual Meeting of Shareholders (the “Annual Meeting”). Mr. Thiel will continue to serve as a director until the date of the Annual Meeting. Following Mr. Thiel’s decision, the Board approved a reduction in the size of the Board to nine (9) members, effective as of the Annual Meeting.
